body:
Recently, a few people have gotten together to make multiplayer games for us Avicus osu! players to enjoy. However, we normally don't have that many people to play, and by looking at the osu! thread, I have a feeling we can make this work.

We are a group of people ranging from people who are just beginners to people who have played for a year or so. Anyone and everyone is invited! ^~^

Normally, we'll play matches on a Saturday night, starting at 8 PM ET; however, this can be variable, and if we can more people, maybe we could set up more matches.

If you are interested, please post your Skype name; I'll add you to our chat.

If you don't know what osu! is, check it out here! http://www.osu.ppy.sh :3

Next Scheduled Match:
Friday, 11/14, 8 PM ET.
It's Free Mod Friday!

Thanks!

~Milkeh
